fields.value: Census of Population and Housing, 1970 Public Use Sample: 5%, One-in-One-Hundred [With 1980 Imputations Prepared by Donald Treiman (1% sample from the SMSA/County Group sample 5% Questionnaire)] (M297V1)

dsDescriptionValue.value: This file is a 1% sample of SMSA's and county groups from both the 5% and 15% samples of the 1970 U.S. Census of Population and Housing.  Each of the 1970 records were matched with Treiman occupational prestige imputations from the 1980 U.S. Census of Population and Housing.
